TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PeerCredential extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含在验证对等网格内的某个对等节点的身份时使用的凭据。

span.span: Contains the credentials used when authenticating a peer node within a peer mesh.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的实例用于指定对等网格的特定安全模式所需的凭据。Instances of this class are used to specify the credentials needed for the particular security mode of a peer mesh. 可以使用 或 访问此类型的实例。An instance of this type can be accessed using or .

summary.span: 获取或设置对等方的 X509 证书。

span.span: Gets or sets an X509 certificate for the peer.

value.span: 对等类的 X509 证书。

span.span: The X509 certificate for the peer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含一个 实例，在对等网格中对邻居进行身份验证时，将使用此实例。This property contains a instance used when authenticating neighbors in the peer mesh. 如果选择的凭据类型为 PeerTransportCredentialType.，则必须指定实例。An instance must be specified if the credential type chosen is PeerTransportCredentialType.. 如果为 PeerTransportCredentialType。If PeerTransportCredentialType. 选择此属性是可选的。is chosen, this property is optional.

summary.span: 获取或设置对等方用于向对等网格进行身份验证的密码。

span.span: Gets or sets the password used by the peer to authenticate with the peer mesh.

value.span: 对等方用于向对等网格进行身份验证的密码。

span.span: The password used by the peer to authenticate with the peer mesh.

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]

summary.span: 获取或设置消息发送方身份验证验证程序。

span.span: Gets or sets the message sender authentication validator.

value.span: 消息发送方身份验证验证程序。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果选择了消息身份验证，则必须填充此属性。This property must be populated if message authentication is chosen. 此属性指定一个验证程序，在验证消息安全性的过程中将调用该验证程序。This property specifies a validator, which will be invoked during message security verification. 在消息中指定的凭据将传递到此属性中指定的验证程序。The credential specified in the message is passed to the validator specified in this property. 验证程序可以接受或拒绝凭据。The validator can either accept or reject the credential.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Security::X509PeerCertificateAuthentication ^ PeerAuthentication { System::ServiceModel::Security::X509PeerCertificateAuthentication ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Security::X509PeerCertificateAuthentication ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置对等身份验证对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the peer authentication object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定一个验证程序，在网格中执行邻居对等身份验证的过程中将调用该验证程序。This property specifies a validator, which is invoked during neighbor-to-neighbor authentication in the mesh. 当新对等方尝试建立邻居连接时，它会将自己的凭据传递到响应的对等方。When a new peer tries to establish a neighbor connection, it passes its own credential to the responding peer. 将调用响应方的验证程序来验证远程方的凭据。The validator of the responder is invoked to verify the credential of the remote party. 每当在网格中建立对等连接时，对等方将会相互进行身份验证，这意味着会同时在两方调用验证程序。Whenever a peer connection is established in the mesh, both peers are mutually authenticated, meaning validators on both ends are invoked.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetCertificate (string subjectName, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation storeLocation, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName storeName);

public: void SetCertificate(System::String ^ subjectName, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::StoreLocation storeLocation, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::StoreName storeName);

span.span: The subject name of the certificate.
The location of the certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载用于指定对等方的证书凭据。This overload is used to specify a certificate credential of the peer. 它以快捷方式的形式提供，用于从用户有权访问的某个可用证书存储区中加载证书。It is provided as a shortcut to load the certificate from one of the available certificate stores that the user has access to.
